Text.Name: GodCity_Housing
Text.Desc: Residence building provided for people of the Divine Realm. Increases Max Divine Residents.

Text.Name: GodCity_Guard
Text.Desc: Facility dedicated to the worship of Guard, through which the Law of Shendao cultivators can obtain the blessing of Guard to improve their own ability.

Text.Name: GodCity_FaithWay
Text.Desc: Each Temple of Performance can communicate with a worshiped statue in the Agency of a city from the Mortal World. Through this system, Law of Shendao cultivators are able to acquire the accumulated Belief on statues from the mortal believers, and play some nice tricks with it.

Text.Name: GodCity_GodFabaoRateUp
Text.Desc: A temple built upon the power of Belief, it is the projection of one's own Sacred Artifact on the Divine Realm. Increase in the Sacred Pavilion's level will enhance one's own Sacred Artifact.

Text.Name: GodCity_GodFabaoLabelAdd1
Text.Desc: Part of the Sacred Pavilion. Grants Sacred Relic the Qi of wind and cloud, rendering it more agile and elegant.

Text.Name: GodCity_GodFabaoLabelAdd2
Text.Desc: Part of the Sacred Pavilion. Grants Sacred Relic the power of a thousand weights, rendering it more powerful.

Text.Name: GodCity_GodFabaoLabelAdd3
Text.Desc: Part of the Sacred Pavilion. Grants Sacred Relic the power of true integrity, rendering it more solid and tough.

Text.Name: GodCity_GodFabaoLabelAdd4
Text.Desc: Part of the Sacred Pavilion. Grants Sacred Relic the power of pliancy, rendering it more flexible and tough.

Text.Name: GodCity_GodFabaoLabelAdd5
Text.Desc: Grants Sacred Relic the power of blade, which is relentlessly sharp.

Text.Name: GodCity_GodFabaoLabelAdd6
Text.Desc: Grants Sacred Relic the power of majesty, which is exceptionally destructive.

Text.Name: GodCity_GodFabaoLabelAdd7
Text.Desc: Grants Sacred Relic the power of mustard seed, rendering it tiny and imperceptible.

Text.Name: GodCity_GodFabaoLabelAdd8
Text.Desc: Grants Sacred Relic the power of heavenly thunder, the power of which is boundless.

Text.Name: GodCity_GodFabaoLabelAdd9
Text.Desc: Grants Sacred Relic the power of all spirits, a deep and boisterous energy.

Text.Name: GodCity_GodFabaoLabelAdd10
Text.Desc: Grants Sacred Relic the power of howling gale, which is as swift as instantaneous.

Text.Name: GodCity_GodFabaoLabelAdd11
Text.Desc: Grants Sacred Relic the power of dark charging, rendering it unstoppable.

Text.Name: GodCity_GodFabaoAbilityAdd1
Text.Desc: Grants Sacred Relic the power of the five poisons. For every 36th strike, it will attack the enemy cultivator's body itself, penetrating shield and deal additional damage.
Text.Levels.0.Effects.0.Ability.Desc: For every 36th strike, it will attack the enemy cultivator's body itself, penetrating shield and deal additional damage.

Text.Name: GodCity_GodFabaoAbilityAdd2
Text.Desc: Grants Sacred Relic the power of spirit charging. Every 18th attack will cast a spell on the target enemy.
Text.Levels.0.Effects.0.Ability.Desc: Every 18th attack will cast a spell on the target enemy.

Text.Name: GodCity_GodFabaoAbilityAdd3
Text.Desc: Grants Sacred Relic the power of holy protection. Protection skill level increased by 5.

Text.Name: GodCity_GodFabaoAbilityAdd4
Text.Desc: Grants Sacred Relic the power of holy magic. Spell skill level increased by 5.

Text.Name: GodCity_GodFabaoAbilityAdd5
Text.Desc: Grants Sacred Relic the power of holy mastery. Artifact Mastery skill level increased by 5.
Text.Levels.0.Effects.0.Ability.Desc: Artifact Mastery skill level increased by 5.

Text.Name: GodCity_GodFabaoAbilityAdd6
Text.Desc: Grants Sacred Relic the power of spirit recalling. 3% of damage dealt will be replenished to the artifact's Qi.
Text.Levels.0.Effects.0.Ability.Desc: 3% of damage dealt will be replenished to the artifact's Qi.

Text.Name: GodCity_GodFabaoAbilityAdd7
Text.Desc: Grants Sacred Relic the power of Spectral. For every 15 attacks, a swordsprite is generated that lasts 15 seconds.
Text.Levels.0.Effects.0.Ability.Desc: For every 15 attacks, a swordsprite is generated that lasts 15 seconds.

Text.Name: GodCity_GodFabaoAbilityAdd8
Text.Desc: Grants Sacred Relic the power of alleviating breath. Every 7 attacks reduce skill cooldown by 1 second.
Text.Levels.0.Effects.0.Ability.Desc: Every 7 attacks reduce skill cooldown by 1 second.

Text.Name: GodCity_GodFabaoAbilityAdd9
Text.Desc: Grants Sacred Relic the power of the Nine Extremities. When dealing damage, there is a 4% chance of dealing 9 times the damage.
Text.Levels.0.Effects.0.Ability.Desc: When dealing damage, there is a 4% chance of dealing 9 times the damage.

Text.Name: GodCity_GodFabaoAbilityAdd10
Text.Desc: Grants Sacred Relic the power of infinity. Power of first sword strike increased by 3 times. The effect is reset when replenishing Qi to the artifact.
Text.Levels.0.Effects.0.Ability.Desc: Power of first sword strike increased by 3 times. The effect is reset when replenishing Qi to the artifact.

Text.Name: GodCity_GodFabaoAbilityAdd11
Text.Desc: Grants Sacred Relic the power of breaking the wind of positivity. Deals 1.25x damage when attacking the enemy's body itself.
Text.Levels.0.Effects.0.Ability.Desc: Deals 1.25x damage when attacking the enemy's body itself.

Text.Name: GodCity_WishTree
Text.Desc: The wishes and prayers of ordinary people have concentrated and formed into a tree. You can harness its Qi of mortals to slightly reduce Divinity.

Text.Name: GodCity_XinyangShendian
Text.Desc: Temple that concentrates the power of Belief. It can increase the efficiency at which Divine Realm produces Belief.

Text.Name: GodCity_LiuLiShenDian
Text.Desc: Temple that magnifies the power of Guards. It can enhance abilities granted to you by Guards.

Text.Name: GodCity_ThunderDefend
Text.Desc: Concentrate the power of Belief to shelter you from the might of heaven. It can reduce the power of Heavenly Tribulation.

Text.Name: GodCity_FengShenTai
Text.Desc: Place where the gods consecrate the sub-gods, anointing Core Followers with 100% Belief into Guards.

Text.Name: GodCity_CoreHousing_A
Text.Desc: Increases Max Core Followers.

Text.Name: GodCity_CoreHousing_B
Text.Desc: Increases Max Core Followers.

Text.Name: GodCity_CoreHousing_C
Text.Desc: Increases Max Core Followers.

Text.Name: GodCity_CoreHousing_D
Text.Desc: Increases Max Core Followers.

Text.Name: GodCity_CoreHousing_E
Text.Desc: Increases Max Core Followers.

Text.Name: GodCity_Housing_Lv2
Text.Desc: Advanced Divine Residence. Can accommodate a large number of Divine Residents.

Text.Name: GodCity_Housing_Lv2_2
Text.Desc: Advanced Divine Residence. Can accommodate a large number of Divine Residents.

Text.Name: GodCity_HongChenKuHai
Text.Desc: Brings the sufferings of the mortals into the Divine Realm, greatly reducing Divinity.

Text.Name: GodCity_Magic_1
Text.Desc: Provides the following Miracles at level 1, level 2 and level 3 respectively: Divine Rallying Spell, Wish-fulfilling Spell, Sole Reverence Spell. Increase the base material output of the area your Embodiment resides in within a certain period of time.

Text.Name: GodCity_Magic_2
Text.Desc: Level 1 provides Miracle - Pacification: Release on a non-Shendao cultivating character and reduce its Mood multiplier by 25%, lasting 7 days. \nLevel 2 provides Miracle - Clean Mind: Resolve an Obsession for the character, and obtain an Obsession Gem.

Text.Name: GodCity_Magic_3
Text.Desc: Level 1 provides Miracle - Deification: Cast a spell to temporarily raise your Divinity to extreme, greatly improving combat prowess.\n Level 2 provides Miracle - Divine Mercy: Consume humanity to attempt to illuminate a plant. The illumination result will need some time to appear. The plant cannot be illuminated with psychic power again while in an illumination session.

Text.Name: GodCity_Magic_4
Text.Desc: Level 1 provides Miracle - Persuasion: Persuade ally or neutral Inner disciple characters to try to convert them into Core Followers. \nLevel 2 provides Miracle - Divinity Tracing: Select a character to try to learn their whereabouts. The more Divine Residents and information you have, the higher the success rate of learning target's whereabouts.
